What I didn't like :

- Wayyy too short, less than 3hours even if you take your time. 
- The game sometimes introduces a fun idea but only for one level (like the companion cube), so it wasn't really exploited to its full potential (probably because there aren't enough levels).
- Not challenging enough (very few instances where you have to act fast for example)
- Fighting is repetitive/boring 

What I liked : 

-Great concept, very well executed
-Smooth controls
-Original experience
-The momentum mechanic is soooo nice

7/10, pretty fun while it lasts
